name: Stay Alight (itch)
description:
You must keep the shadows away from your campfire to stay awake and survive the night. You can find NPCs that will help you protect your campfire. Get close to them in order to recruit them. But beware - the corruption may get to them eventually... There are wooden sticks to be found in the forest, which you can gather to feed the fire and restore health.

If you get lost, press space to orient yourself toward the distant glimmer of the campfire.
